name: Hugomichel.GitHub.io
body:
hugomichel

Twitter Advantages:

  • Simple design
  • Quick information
  • Personalized information

    • Twitter Disadvantages:

    • Few users compared with FB
    • No mutual friends
    • Servers fail constantly

Strategic goal: Having more users than Twitter

  • Better mobile app, and letting the user to use more clients than Twitter.
  • Videos can be watched inside the app, without opening the Youtube link
  • Introducing the like, but also a dislike button.
    • Audience

    The audience of my new app will be focused into three different groups which are: Sports fan, News fans and Entertainment fans

    Sports fan: Loyal to their teams, interested in the stats and looking for their team news.

    News fan: Looking for new information, interested in worldwide situtations and culturally open

    Entertainment fans: Sharing their opinions, looking forward for trailers and information about their series and reviwing new episodes or movies

    Profile: Any age Any Sex Occupation: Mainly students or any job Education: Basic Education

    Personality: Open and extrovertive Looking forward to meeting new people Searching for new information Thinking people

    Referents and Influences: Friends Other twitter users Sports fans Series fans
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
